## Properties

`type Size = 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | 'inherit'`    
`type BreakpointCustomizable<T> = { base: T; xs?: T; s?: T; m?: T; l?: T; xl?: T; }`

| Property | Attribute | Description                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the spinner.                             | `'small'` <br> \| `'medium'` <br> \| `'large'` <br> \| `'inherit'` <br> \| `BreakpointCustomizable<Size>` | `'small'` |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Adapts the spinner color depending on the theme. | `'dark'` <br> \| `'light'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `'light'` |
